title: Beef and pepper kebabs
description: These skewers are very easy to make and packed with flavour.This meal is low calorie and provides 421 kcal, 27.8g protein, 32.3g carbohydrate (of which 5.5g sugars), 20.6g fat (of which 2.8g saturates), 1.6g fibre and 0.4g salt per portion.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
